Element.Name: UBL version identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the version of syntax that transactions are based on.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Transaction identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the pre-award catalogue request that allows referencing the pre-award catalogue request.

Element.Name: Issue date
Element.Description: The date something was issued.

Element.Name: Issue time
Element.Description: The time something was issued.

Element.Name: Version
Element.Description: An identifier for the version of a transaction message.

Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive .

Element.Name: Economic operator electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Economic operator identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that identifies the economic operator, such as a legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or post code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision code
Element.Description: A code that identifies a subdivision of a country, e.,g., a province or district.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: The main line in an address.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line

Element.Name: Country Code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Country of registration
Element.Description: The country where the party is registered.

Element.Name: Location code
Element.Description: A code signifying the type of location. The code can be found in the code list.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is located.

Element.Name: Identification code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact point's name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contracting body
Element.Description: The contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or public works using a tendering procedure as described in the applicable directive

Element.Name: Contracting body electronic address identifier
Element.Description: Electronic address of the contracting body.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO).

Element.Name: Economic operator name
Element.Description: The name of the economic operator.

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of a city where the address is located.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service, such as a ZIP code or post code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision code
Element.Description: A code that identifies a subdivision of a country, e.,g., a province or district.

Element.Name: Address line
Element.Description: The main line in an address.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line

Element.Name: Country Code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.

Element.Name: Country of registration
Element.Description: The country where the party is registered.

Element.Name: Location code
Element.Description: A code signifying the type of location. The code can be found in the code list.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is located.

Element.Name: Identification code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact point's name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact point
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: An e-mail address for the contact point.

Element.Name: Catalogue request line
Element.Description: A line in a pre-award cataloue request specifying

Element.Name: Catalogue request line identifier
Element.Description: An identifer for the catalogue request line being unique within pre-award catalogue request.

Element.Name: Estimated value
Element.Description: The estimated value of the an item or an requested item.

Element.Name: Catalogue request line
Element.Description: A line in a pre-award cataloue request specifying

Element.Name: Catalogue request line identifier
Element.Description: An identifer for the catalogue request line being unique within pre-award catalogue request.

Element.Name: Total budget amount
Element.Description: The total budget amount for the requested item.

Element.Name: Item request description
Element.Description: A description of the item request specifying the kind of item that is requested.

Element.Name: Item request name
Element.Description: A name for the item request, e.g., the kind of item that is requested.

Element.Name: Call for tenders award criterion reference
Element.Description: A reference to the awarding criterion that the tender fulfills.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: Textual description of the document.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Document digest
Element.Description: Digest of the document.

Element.Name: Document digest method code
Element.Description: Code that indicates the algorithm used to calculate the hash.

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: A classification of this item according to a specific system for classifying commodities.

Attribute.Name: Item request classification name
Attribute.Description: The name of the classification for this item.

Element.Name: Information request identifier
Element.Description: An identifier of an information request that allows to reference the information request.

Element.Name: Information request name
Element.Description: A name of the requested information

Attribute.Name: Information request reference
Attribute.Description: A code representing the requested information.

Attribute.Name: Item property classification code
Attribute.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system

Element.Name: Item property description
Element.Description: A description of the item property.

Element.Name: Item request quantity
Element.Description: The quantity of the requested item offered in a pre-award catalogue.

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Attribute.Name: Item property unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant.

Element.Name: Information request relevance
Element.Description: Relevance of the requested information in the response document, in particular, of it is mandatory or optional.

Element.Name: Item property minimum value
Element.Description: A value defining the upper boundary of the value range within which the actual value of the item property is allowed.

Element.Name: Item property maximum value
Element.Description: A value defining the upper boundary of the value range within which the actual value of the item property is allowed.
